tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
With god's grace I found Dr. T Rajeshwari who supported me throughout my 9 months span of pregnancy and delivery as well.

She made me 9 months so smooth , I was able to have all my belief and trust in her and did exactly what she guided me with. I had case of double cord which doctor handled calmly and got me normal delivery. My experience with her been so great and would recommend her to anyone looking for **** gynecologist.

Not just delivery but even she is right person for post delivery consultation as well.
With all my experience i could say
she is the living God for me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Caesarean Section (C Section),Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Tests,
review: I visited Dr Rajeshwari post 1 month of conception and throughout my pregnancy period. She performed Caesarian delivery and by far the best doctor. Being first time parents I and my husband needed one thing that comfort and Dr. Rajeshwari ensure we had ample amount of it throughout our 9 months period. She explains every bit with a lot of patience and tremendous experience and superb skills. I was a gestational diabetes case due to which artificial pains had to be induced post completion of 38 weeks and she tried till the very last min. To perform normal delivery however due to induction failure it couldn’t happen and we had to choose C-section. ******** ** *** ***** *** **** ************* ** **** *** *** *** ***** **** **** *** visit her for the best experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My Mom traveled all the way from Ranchi to see Dr T Rajeshwari as we got the reference from my known . Initially my mom is so worried due to age factor and off course the complications. The way she explained is very impressive  and She make sure patient are fully relax and comfortable for the entire treatment  process . She is very good in surgery because my mom took very less time to recover , and more important her entire team and assistance are so friendly and making sure all the comfort and help whenever we need . She also make sure follow ups in place to check the progress . And one important quality we impress that she trying to get less medicines . Overall my experience is really good and I also recommending to my circles .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I don't recommend this doctor ,she don't care the patient once surgery gets completed.******* *** ********* *** ******* ******** **** ****** ***** **** ********** ** ***** ***** **** ** **********Really I don't recommend this doctor for everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dear Dr Rajeswari Garu – Million thanks to you and your entire team for giving us the much-needed counselling and creating confidence to go ahead with surgery “Emergency Non-Descent vaginal hysterectomy” in just 20 minutes which we were not able to decide in last 24 hours. Your entire team and I must mention Dr Pragnya Garu, Dr Vithal Garu, Dr Pawan Garu and Dr Jaisimha Garu for creating confidence in us with caring, gentle, and understanding nature. My wife who is 52 years old was in perimenopausal stage had Molar Pregnancy/Gestational Trophoblastic Disease with 18 weeks uterus size along with Thyrotoxic Storm which triggered cardiac issues, respiratory distress, high Beta HCG and had very high BP was in trauma and we were badly worried.
With my wife being in high risk condition and Dr Rajeswari Garu going ahead with this option of surgery was commendable which was completed in lesser time with less bleeding and no stiches at all, mobilized in a day. I can see my wife is recovering sooner and all the tests getting done on daily basis.
Having said that, I would like to see improvement the way patients are handled at MRI and CT Scan sections. More staff needs to be deployed so that patients are given minimum strain while they are placed at MRI/CT Scan platforms. This will surely be a huge value addition.
I wish Dr Rajeswari Garu and her entire team at Care Hosptial Gachibowli the best to keep the good work and save more lives.

Best Regards, Ravi Babu

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: My wife is pregnant and it's a  second semester and this is the first visit to the doctor .Till second semester we were visiting different doctor and different hospital.Best thing we liked is clear explanation and reason incase of any scans/tests to be performed.special care to patients in this crisis ( Corona Virus)that don't visit to hospital unless it's urgent and for any doubts we can have a chat/call.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Very good care and clear explanation for any worries or problems I faced during delivery, And doctors are very friendly after delivery (gynaecologist, Pediatrician, nutritionalist).
And nurses (Deepanjali, Anuradha) are good in taking care of mother and baby

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very experienced and friendly doctor and treated well for the delivery of the baby. Explains all details and listens patiently. Recovered well after the surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: * **** **** ******* she has motherly instinct in her herself. i was doubting with some isssue. she again called me and clarify everything. a very soft spoken and professional doctor. her voice itself works like a vocal tonic. she is amazing. Thank you doctor. Thank you so much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I visited the doctor for preconception counselling *** **** * *** *** ******* ********** she is always in hurry and mentions “all is good”, “ nothing to worry about”, when infact the patient gets kind of convinced and leaves but not satisfied.
Totally do not recommend.
reply_text: Don’t know what satisfaction you are talking about, when everything is good u still have unreasonable doubts and we can teach you medicine ....... if u trust doctor then believe what they say if you don’t trust then nothing helps. I spend a lot of time with patients but cannot entertain unreasonable doubts specially born out of google

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** *** ******* ********* *** ******* ******* ***** ********* So many things she didn't tell me ***** * ***** ***** **** *** ********* For a fee of 1100 rupees I expected more empathy from a doctor. But she was in hurry to move on to next patient.
reply_text:
Dear sir/ma’am,
Consultation fees is decided by organisation which includes infrastructure/ receptionist, nurse, AC/chair, lift, parking/ security and many more such things, it’s not just for doctor.
You were given enough time. The problem is patients want to come in 2 nd time 3rd time to again ask for medicines , tests etc, kindly be empathetic to us and give full attention while we explain to you. We have other patients who write that we made them wait……so time has to be respected. I never rush consultation and always wait for patients to finish their side. If google can help you more than doctors plz go ahead and feel free to use it. No doctor is a encyclopaedia….Plz don’t be so unreasonable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: She is excellent and gave elaborate analysis about the issue and explained everything scientifically and given ultimate confidence to resolve the disease .
